verses.name: Acts 4:6
verses.text: And Annas the high priest, and Caiaphas, and John, and Alexander, and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest, were gathered together at Jerusalem.

verses.name: Acts 4:7
verses.text: And when they had set them in the midst, they asked, By what power, or by what name, have ye done this?

verses.name: Acts 4:8
verses.text: Then Peter, filled with the Holy Ghost, said unto them, Ye rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,

verses.name: Acts 4:9
verses.text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man, by what means he is made whole;
